attributes.additional_details: I would like to see NatWest Bank become stand-alone again and not part of Royal Bank of Scotland.  It was due to a hostile bid by Bank of Scotland that shareholders and staff voted for the lesser of two evils and went with the bid from RBS.   NatWest was well respected and RBS have dragged them down.  I want the Government to separate them and let NatWest carve its own path again.
